fields.name: items_dispensed
fields.subject: {{ subject }}
fields.html_content:
Hi {{ name }},

A staff member has dispensed items to you!

Items Loaned to You:

    {% for loan in loan_list %}
  • {{ loan.item.name }} ({{ loan.quantity }})
    • {% empty %}
    None {% endfor %}

Items Disbursed to You:

    {% for disbursement in disbursement_list %}
  • {{ disbursement.item.name }} ({{ disbursement.quantity }})
    • {% empty %}
    None {% endfor %}

Please contact a staff member if you have any questions.

Best Regards,
ECE Inventory System Staff

fields.name: request_action
fields.subject: {{ subject }}
fields.html_content:
Hi {{ name }},

Your request was {{ request_state }}. The request has the following items:

Items for Loan:

    {% for loan in loan_list %}
  • {{ loan.item.name }} ({{ loan.quantity }})
    • {% empty %}
    None {% endfor %}

Items for Disbursement:

    {% for disbursement in disbursement_list %}
  • {{ disbursement.item.name }} ({{ disbursement.quantity }})
    • {% empty %}
    None {% endfor %}

Please contact a staff member if you have any questions.

Best Regards,
ECE Inventory System Staff

fields.name: return_loan
fields.subject: {{ subject }}
fields.html_content:
Hi {{ name }},

You have returned the following loaned item.

{{ item_name }} ({{ quantity }})

Please contact a staff member if you have any questions.

Best Regards,
ECE Inventory System Staff

fields.name: return_all_loans
fields.subject: {{ subject }}
fields.html_content:
Hi {{ name }},

You have returned the following loaned items in full. The loaned items and quantities returned are detailed below:

    {% for loan in loan_list %}
  • {{ loan.item.name }} ({{ loan.quantity }})
    • {% empty %}
    None {% endfor %}

Please contact a staff member if you have any questions.

Best Regards,
ECE Inventory System Staff

fields.name: convert_loan_to_disbursement
fields.subject: {{ subject }}
fields.html_content:
Hi {{ name }},

The following item that was loaned to you has now been converted to disbursement. The item name and quantity converted are shown below.

{{ item_name }} ({{ quantity }})

Please contact a staff member if you have any questions.

Best Regards,
ECE Inventory System Staff

fields.name: loan_reminder
